Rulings.Edison:
Trap Monster Rulings
● When this card is activated, its Spell/Trap Zone cannot be used until the card is removed from the field, even while it is in the Monster Zone.
● While in the Monster Zone, this card can still be targeted by "Mystical Space Typhoon", and be destroyed by "Heavy Storm".
● If an effect is applying that negates Trap Effects ("Royal Decree", "Jinzo", "Trap Stun"), this card returns face-up to the Spell/Trap Zone, and is not Summoned again even when that effect stops applying.
● If this card becomes Set while in the Monster Zone, eg by "Book of Moon", it returns face-down to the Spell/Trap Zone.

Rulings.Base:
1. Tributing a monster is a cost.
2. You cannot Tribute this card to activate its effect.
3. You can Tribute Monster Tokens and "Machine King - 3000 B.C." will gain ATK.
4. If "Skill Drain" is activated, "Machine King - 3000 B.C." loses its ATK increase and will not regain it even if "Skill Drain" is destroyed.
5. This card's effect is considered to be a monster effect. It is an Ignition Effect, Spell Speed 1.

PSCT.Base: Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Machine-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1000). (This card is also still a Trap Card.) You cannot Normal or Special Summon other monsters the turn you activate this card. Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can Tribute 1 Machine-Type monster; this card gains ATK equal to the ATK the Tributed monster had on the field, until the end of this turn.
